pr_title: Use byte[] keys in FormatWriter to save on hashmap lookups when the keys are constant

timeline.message: implement micro-optimisation suggested by Boaz Sedan

timeline.bodyText: I guess JsonFormatWriter is not performance critical, so the extra String allocations here are not a concern.
timeline.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: Exactly, but I want to do a bit more due diligence on this to see if it's worth the drop in code quality.
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.bodyText:
NPE happens here, for example when DDSpanContext#getSpanType() returns null
compare to : https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-java/pull/1455/files#diff-d27443624dce2e3e0340de2124be31aeR37
timeline.author: lpriima

replies.bodyText: addressed, would you be willing to approve please?
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.message: remove duplication, fix NPE in write string
